title: Enjoy unmetered bandwidth and effortless website hosting with DoRoyal, now under $40
content:
Macworld

Running a website can get expensive over time. Between domain renewals and web hosting fees, you could spend hundreds or even thousands every year. So, why not lock in a discounted lifetime of web hosting?

Ahead of Black Friday, gift yourself or a loved one lifetime access to DoRoyal Web Hosting for only $39.97 (reg. $225) through November 16th!

DoRoyal (4.3-star rated on Trustpilot!) has been helping people affordablely operate their websites since 2012. It’s an intuitive platform that makes it easy to migrate your current website or build a new one from scratch. Users can enjoy DoRoyal’s unmetered bandwidth and web space, GD library, daily cloud backups, DirectAdmin, WordPress Manager, PHP, and more.

Plus, this platform offers flexing hosting solutions, including the following:

  • Unlimited domains
  • Unlimited subdomains
  • Unlimited email accounts
  • Unlimited databases

There’s also a Softaculous script installer and an online file manager, meaning you can easily access a host of add-ons to fully customize your site. Meanwhile, anti-virus technology and Spam Assassin give you the security you need.

Settle up your or a loved one’s web hosting needs for life. Until November 16th at 11:59pm P.T., get a lifetime subscription to DoRoyal Web Hosting for just $39.97. No coupon required!
